General.Name: KMC (Kuei Meng) International Inc
General.Description: KMC (Kuei Meng) International Inc. manufactures and sells various types of chains, motorcycle components, and vehicle components in Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company offers motorcycle components comprising of drive chain, cam chain, transmission kit, and motorcycle sprocket. It also offers bicycle chains, automobile timing system, and garage door opener products. In addition, the company engages in investing activities. KMC (Kuei Meng) International Inc. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan. KMC (Kuei Meng) International Inc. is a subsidiary of KMC Transton Industries Limited.
General.Address: No.425, Jhonghua Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 710
